TAUNT.title: Taunt
TAUNT.description: Enemies must attack this minion first.

STEALTH.title: Stealth
STEALTH.description: Cannot be targeted until it attacks.

GLASS_FRAME.title: Glass Frame
GLASS_FRAME.description: The first damage taken is reduced to 0.

BATTLECRY.title: Battlecry
BATTLECRY.description: Effect triggers when owner's turn started.

DEATHRATTLE.title: Deathrattle
DEATHRATTLE.description: Effect triggers when this minion dies.
